message.entry: You have not yet chosen a folder for storing custom patterns for use with the Stateflow Pattern Wizard. Please choose a folder where you want to store files for the custom patterns. This preference will be remembered for future sessions. Please make sure you have write permissions to this folder if you are going to add your own patterns.
No Stateflow pattern selected. Select a pattern to save.
Open a Stateflow chart before inserting a pattern.
Unable to create pattern. Make sure you do not have any other models with the same name loaded.
TIP: Try the following command to see if any models with the same name are loaded into memory.\n\nopen_bd = find_system(''type'', ''block_diagram'')
Model has unsaved changes. Please save the model and retry.
{0} model does not contain any Stateflow charts.
Error while adding pattern because the model ''{0}'' contains more than one chart or an atomic subchart.
Nothing to add. {0} model contains an empty Stateflow chart.
Invalid file type. Select a MATLAB script or function file.
MATLAB file contains a syntax error.
Conversion of nested functions is not supported.
Conversion of MATLAB classes is not supported.
Conversion of MATLAB code to graphical functions is supported only in standalone Stateflow charts for execution in MATLAB.
Error arranging graphical function. Add missing default transition.
Error arranging graphical function. Select a graphical function to arrange.
